original_text: And he conferred with Joab the son of Zeruiah, and with Abiathar the priest: and they following Adonijah helped him.
korean_text: 아도니야가 스루야의 아들 요압과 제사장 아비아달과 모의하니 그들이 따르고 도우나

sentences.original_text: And he conferred with Joab the son of Zeruiah
and they following Adonijah helped him
